Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Maximal contraction to norepinephrine was modestly reduced in arteries from LNNA compared with control rats whereas the maximum contraction to ET - 1 was significantly reduced ( 54 % control ) .

Let's think step by step.

Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here are the "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| LNNA |
| control rats |
| ET-1 |

In the paragraph, the following entities are mentioned as diseases:

* LNNA (Lateral Nucleus of the Accessory Nucleus of the Medulla Oblongata)
* control rats (the control group in the experiment)
* ET-1 (Endothelin-1)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| LNNA |
| ET-1 |

The following entities do not clearly refer to "Disease" and have been removed from the table:

* control rats (this is a group in the experiment, not a disease)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
